scripts.predev: node -e "if(process.env.NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED==='0'){console.error('Refusing to run: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 disables TLS verification. Remove it and use proper CA trust.');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "if(process.env.NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED==='0'){console.error('Refusing to build: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 disables TLS verification. Remove it and use proper CA trust.');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.prestart: node -e "if(process.env.NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED==='0'){console.error('Refusing to start: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 disables TLS verification. Remove it and use proper CA trust.');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.prelint: node -e "if(process.env.NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED==='0'){console.error('Refusing to lint: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 disables TLS verification. Remove it and use proper CA trust.');process.exit(1)}"
